column1: L, Fox & Friends Claims 'Woke' Liberals Are Plotting To Turn Mother's Day Into 'Birthing People's Day', David, 2021-05-09,
column2: The hosts of Fox & Friends expressed concern on Sunday that liberals are plotting to turn Mother's Day into "Birthing People's Day."
column3: If you're a lefty it might be happy Birthing People's Day Fox News co-host Pete Hegseth announced. "Seriously! This is Democrats -- the new phrase they want to use is you're not a mother. Nope! Done! You're a birthing person."
column4: Hegseth pointed to a House committee hearing wherethe phrase "birthing people" was used on at least two occasions. However the terms "mothers" and "moms" were also used.
column5: Co-host Jedidiah Bila echoed the remarks of Rep. Nancy Mace (R-SC) who lashed out at "woke" liberals over the phrase.
column6: I could not agree more Bila said. "Let me tell you something. I birthed a baby. I am a mom. I am proud of myself. I am always astonished at my body. I'm like you know what? We're super heroes. We women are super heroes for being able to do that. I want proper credit."
column7: Hegseth recalled that he had once tried to experience the pain of childbirth during aFox & Friends segment in 2019.
column8: Thank God for women co-host Lawrence Jones said. "God designed them to give birth because whew I can do a lot of things. I don't think that's for me."
column9: Yep Bila agreed. "We have a higher pain tolerance. And I did it without drugs."
column10: But I'm officially a birthing person Hegseth noted. "Next time someone tells you that tell them you're insane! They are moms and they give birth."
